scripts.test:int:db: cross-env MYSQL_HOST=127.0.0.1 MYSQL_PORT=3308 MYSQL_DB=prodental_test node test/setupTestDb.js
scripts.test:int: npm run test:int:db && cross-env MYSQL_HOST=127.0.0.1 MYSQL_PORT=3308 MYSQL_DB=prodental_test jest --runInBand --testPathPattern=src/integration
scripts.test:int:cov: npm run test:int:db && cross-env MYSQL_DB=prodental_test jest --runInBand --testPathPattern=src/integration --coverage
